alert.note: Alert for Harris; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 9:13AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Troup and northwestern Harris Counties through 1000 AM EDT... At 913 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from State Line Park to near Denson to Chambers County Lake, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, West Point, Hogansville, Mountville, Cannonville, Louise, State Line Park, Abbottsford, Piedmont Heights, Hillcrest, Big Springs, Wares Crossroads, Jones Crossroads, Baughs Crossroads, Smiths Crossroad, Whitesville-Pine Lake and Long Cane. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EDT for west central Georgia.
